articles.content: By Robin Foster and E.J. MundellHealthDay ReportersMONDAY, June 1, 2020 -- As the number of U.S. coronavirus cases neared 1.8 million on Monday, a new poll shows that a majority of Americans still th… [+9149 chars]

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Preschoolers are using apps meant for adults, study finds - CNN
articles.description: A new study has found parents aren't up on their preschooler's screen time, nor are they aware of the many violent and adult options these young children are accessing. Parents should remain vigilant on the type of content their child is viewing.
articles.content: (CNN)Relaxing the rules on screen time for kids has become more acceptable during the pandemic as parents struggle to balance working from home with the demands of childcare, schoolwork and cabin fev… [+7867 chars]
